alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 7:05PM CDT until July 16 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT FOR SOUTHERN SHERIDAN COUNTY... At 605 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles north of Ellsworth, or 27 miles northeast of Alliance, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Snow Lake, Watson Lake, Diamond Lake, Lakeside, Wolf Hill, Smith Lake State Wildlife Management Area and Argo Hill. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 27. Highway 2 between mile markers 106 and 112. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
